languages.text: "И все же... в моей жизни есть кучка ашмагов и кассх, за которых я несу ответственность. Они верны мне, подобно пустотным псам, и не раз вытаскивали меня с того света. Если не помогу им сегодня — сейчас — никогда себя не прощу. Вы пойдете со мной, шерин? Поможете их спасти?"

"Even so... They may be a bunch of ashmags and kaskhas, but they're my ashmags and kaskhas. They are loyal to me like void dogs, and they've dragged me back from the brink of death more than once. If I don't help them today — now — I will never forgive myself. Will you come with me, shereen? Will you help save them?"
languages.original_text: "И все же... в моей жизни есть кучка ашмагов и кассх, за которых я несу ответственность. Они верны мне, подобно пустотным псам, и не раз вытаскивали меня с того света. Если не помогу им сегодня — сейчас — никогда себя не прощу. Вы пойдете со мной, шерин? Поможете их спасти?"

traits.locale_text: "Even so... They may be a bunch of ashmags and kaskhas, but they're my ashmags and kaskhas. They are loyal to me like void dogs, and they've dragged me back from the brink of death more than once. If I don't help them today — now — I will never forgive myself. Will you come with me, shereen? Will you help save them?"

"Even so... They may be a bunch of ashmags and kaskhas, but they're my ashmags and kaskhas. They are loyal to me like void dogs, and they've dragged me back from the brink of death more than once. If I don't help them today — now — I will never forgive myself. Will you come with me, shereen? Will you help save them?"

"Even so... They may be a bunch of ashmags and kaskhas, but they're my ashmags and kaskhas. They are loyal to me like void dogs, and they've dragged me back from the brink of death more than once. If I don't help them today — now — I will never forgive myself. Will you come with me, shereen? Will you help save them?"

"Even so... They may be a bunch of ashmags and kaskhas, but they're my ashmags and kaskhas. They are loyal to me like void dogs, and they've dragged me back from the brink of death more than once. If I don't help them today — now — I will never forgive myself. Will you come with me, shereen? Will you help save them?"

languages.text: "Trotzdem ... Sie mögen eine Horde von Ashmags und Kaskhas sein, aber sie sind meine Ashmags und Kaskhas. Sie sind mir treu ergeben wie Leerenhunde und haben mich nicht nur einmal vor dem Tod bewahrt. Wenn ich ihnen heute nicht helfe – jetzt –, werde ich mir das nie verzeihen. Werdet Ihr mich begleiten, Shereen? Helft Ihr mir, sie zu retten?"
languages.original_text: "Even so... They may be a bunch of ashmags and kaskhas, but they're my ashmags and kaskhas. They are loyal to me like void dogs, and they've dragged me back from the brink of death more than once. If I don't help them today — now — I will never forgive myself. Will you come with me, shereen? Will you help save them?"

traits.locale_text: "Trotzdem ... Sie mögen eine Horde von Ashmags und Kaskhas sein, aber sie sind meine Ashmags und Kaskhas. Sie sind mir treu ergeben wie Leerenhunde und haben mich nicht nur einmal vor dem Tod bewahrt. Wenn ich ihnen heute nicht helfe – jetzt –, werde ich mir das nie verzeihen. Werdet Ihr mich begleiten, Shereen? Helft Ihr mir, sie zu retten?"

languages.text: « Cela dit... même si ce n'est qu'une bande d'ashmags et de kaskhas, ce sont mes ashmags et mes kaskhas. Ils me sont aussi fidèles que des chiens du vide et ils m'ont tirée des griffes de la mort plus d'une fois. Si je ne les aide pas maintenant, sans plus attendre, je ne me le pardonnerai jamais. Voulez-vous bien m'accompagner, shereen ? M'aiderez-vous à les sauver ? »
languages.original_text: "Even so... They may be a bunch of ashmags and kaskhas, but they're my ashmags and kaskhas. They are loyal to me like void dogs, and they've dragged me back from the brink of death more than once. If I don't help them today — now — I will never forgive myself. Will you come with me, shereen? Will you help save them?"

traits.locale_text: « Cela dit... même si ce n'est qu'une bande d'ashmags et de kashkas, ce sont mes ashmags et mes kashkas. Ils me sont aussi fidèles que des chiens du vide et ils m'ont tirée des griffes de la mort plus d'une fois. Si je ne les aide pas maintenant, sans plus attendre, je ne me le pardonnerai jamais. Voulez-vous bien m'accompagner, shereen ? M'aiderez-vous à les sauver ? »

languages.text: “但即便如此……或许他们确实是一群坏种、贱人，但他们是我的坏种、贱人。他们就像狗一样忠诚，不止一次把我从死亡边缘拉回来。如果我现在不去救他们，我恐怕永远不会原谅我自己。你愿意和我一起来吗，亲爱的？你愿意帮忙救他们一命吗？”
languages.original_text: "Even so... They may be a bunch of ashmags and kaskhas, but they're my ashmags and kaskhas. They are loyal to me like void dogs, and they've dragged me back from the brink of death more than once. If I don't help them today — now — I will never forgive myself. Will you come with me, shereen? Will you help save them?"

traits.locale_text: “但即便如此……或许他们确实是一群坏种、贱人，但他们是我的坏种、贱人。他们就像狗一样忠诚，不止一次把我从死亡边缘拉回来。如果我现在不去救他们，我恐怕永远不会原谅我自己。你愿意和我一起来吗，亲爱的？你愿意帮忙救他们一命吗？”

languages.text: «Aun así... Serán una panda de ashmags y kaskhas, pero son mis ashmags y kaskhas. Me son tan leales como los perros del vacío, y me han salvado de las garras de la muerte más de una vez. Si no les ayudo hoy, ahora, jamás me lo perdonaré. ¿Vendrá conmigo, shereen? ¿Me ayudará a salvarles?».
languages.original_text: "Even so... They may be a bunch of ashmags and kaskhas, but they're my ashmags and kaskhas. They are loyal to me like void dogs, and they've dragged me back from the brink of death more than once. If I don't help them today — now — I will never forgive myself. Will you come with me, shereen? Will you help save them?"

traits.locale_text: «Aun así... Serán una panda de ashmags y kaskhas, pero son mis ashmags y kaskhas. Me son tan leales como los perros del vacío, y me han salvado de las garras de la muerte más de una vez. Si no les ayudo hoy, ahora, jamás me lo perdonaré. ¿Vendrá conmigo, shereen? ¿Me ayudará a salvarles?».

languages.text: 「だとしても...相手はアッシュマグやカスカかもしれないけど、あたしのアッシュマグであたしのカスカだ。あいつらは虚空の犬のように忠実で、何度も死の淵からあたしを連れ戻してくれたんだ。もし今日…今…あいつらを助けなかったとしたら、あたしは一生自分を許せない。一緒に来てくれないか、シャリーン？あいつらを救う手助けをしてくれないか？」
languages.original_text: "Even so... They may be a bunch of ashmags and kaskhas, but they're my ashmags and kaskhas. They are loyal to me like void dogs, and they've dragged me back from the brink of death more than once. If I don't help them today — now — I will never forgive myself. Will you come with me, shereen? Will you help save them?"

traits.locale_text: 「だとしても...相手はアッシュマグやカスカかもしれないけど、あたしのアッシュマグであたしのカスカだ。あいつらは虚空の犬のように忠実で、何度も死の淵からあたしを連れ戻してくれたんだ。もし今日…今…あいつらを助けなかったとしたら、あたしは一生自分を許せない。一緒に来てくれないか、シャリーン？あいつらを救う手助けをしてくれないか？」

languages.text: "Öyle de olsa... Evet, bir yığın külboğaz ve kaşkadan ibaretler ama benim emrimdeler. Bana uçsuz köpeği gibi sadıklar. Çok kez ölümün eşiğinden kurtardılar beni. Bugün onlara yardım etmezsem... Hatta şimdi etmezsem kendimi asla bağışlayamam. Benimle gelir misin şirinim? Onları kurtarmama yardım eder misin?"
languages.original_text: "Even so... They may be a bunch of ashmags and kaskhas, but they're my ashmags and kaskhas. They are loyal to me like void dogs, and they've dragged me back from the brink of death more than once. If I don't help them today — now — I will never forgive myself. Will you come with me, shereen? Will you help save them?"
